downloadDescription: Model, track, and manage your customer engagement process with this Visio 2010 cross-functional flowchart template.
detailsSection:
Use this Microsoft Visio 2010 template to model, track, and manage your customer engagement workflow and identify opportunities for improvement. This template outlines each step in the engagement process, from initial request through to completion, outlining responsibilities by role (including the sales representative, project manager, and development team). The template was created with the cross-functional flowchart functionality in Visio 2010 and includes imported sample data that has been automatically linked to shapes. Shape data graphic parameters have been set to update when changes are made to the underlying data. 

By customizing this template, you could use it to analyze virtually any workflow or process—such as IT product implementation processes, manufacturing workflows, or construction projects—by time and by workgroup or resource.
installInstructionSection:
Click Download to save the template to your computer.

To customize the data linked to the template, download Process Improvement Data.xlsx and populate it with your own process data.
